name: Snowball Fight Simulator (itch)
description:
A Short Game About Having A Snowball Fight With Artificial-Intelligence.

I made this game over the holiday break because I was bored and I wanted to learn more about AI.

Some things might be buggy and broken 

(things are most definitely broken)

I might add a few maps or something idk

I didn't know much about AI but in this short project I learned something...

AI SUCKS.

This is sorta my first time working with AI, and if you have played this game you can tell I suck at it, but anyway the point of this project/game was to learn more about AI.
